abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on O'Hara's Restaurant and Pub, Irish pub in Financial District that has become memorial to events of September 11, 2001; bar has long been patronized by New York  firefighters, some of whom died that day.
lead_paragraph: O’Hara’s Restaurant and Pub, a traditional Irish watering hole, has become a powerful Sept. 11 monument of its own.

headline.main: O’Hara’s, Ground Zero Pub Where Memories Are a Badge of Honor
headline.print_headline: Where Memories Are a Badge of Honor

snippet: O’Hara’s Restaurant and Pub, a traditional Irish watering hole, has become a powerful Sept. 11 monument of its own.
